segments.text: Mr . Li , I come to remind you of the meeting scheduled at 11 o'clock this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's right . And the general manager asked me to report the company's sales for last year at the meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , the meeting will be held in your office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . That's what I should do .
segments.speaker: S1
